trans-unit.source: Light object that projects its effect along a direction specified by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight> objects have no position in space.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight> objetos não têm nenhuma posição no espaço.

trans-unit.source: Constructs a light that projects its effect along a direction specified by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />..
Creates an instance of a light that projects its effect in a specified direction.
This contructor creates an instance of a white light projected along a Vector3D of value `(0,0,-1)`.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor cria uma instância de um white leve projetado ao longo de um Vector3D do valor `(0,0,-1)`.

trans-unit.source: DirectionalLights have a direction, but no position in space.
trans-unit.target: DirectionalLights tem uma direção, mas nenhuma posição no espaço.

trans-unit.source: The following code excerpt creates a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight>.
trans-unit.target: O trecho de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight>.

trans-unit.source: Diffuse color of the new light.
Direction of the new light.
Creates an instance of a light that projects its effect along a specified Vector3D with a specified color.
DirectionalLights have a direction, but no position in space.
trans-unit.target: DirectionalLights tem uma direção, mas nenhuma posição no espaço.

trans-unit.source: The following code excerpt creates a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight>.
trans-unit.target: O trecho de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight" /> object, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
Represents the vector along which the light's effect will be seen on models in a 3-D scene.
Vector3D along which the light projects, and which must have a non-zero magnitude.
trans-unit.target: Vector3D ao longo do qual os projetos leves e que deve ter uma magnitude diferente de zero.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>(0,0,-1)</c>.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight.Direction" /> dependency property.
